title: opl prize :(
body: ok riot i wanna start off by saying. i dont want this to sound like im bit**ing about not getting my prize. but what i am asking is that when are we going to get our prizes for winning the trivia competition in the opl 2015 grand final at luna park. like i dont even mind if i DONT recieve the prize. but i am bothered that i have been anxiously waiting for my gift now for around 6 weeks. if you arent going to send it at least notify the people as id rather know so i dont keep waiting, soz my wording was HORRIBLE.

replies.body:
Hey Waser,

I'm sorry this has taken so long! Rest assured that we haven't forgotten about you, and you will still be getting your prize - it's taking us a little bit longer to put together than we expected, though. I'll try and provide an update as soon as I've got one - you're totally right that we should have reached out before now with some information.

Thanks,
Achenar
ok thanks cheers for the heads up

Hey Waser,

A quick update - I've just popped your prize in the post! You should see it sometime in the next few days.

I'm really sorry this has taken so long - thank you for being so patient with us! Hopefully you like it. :)

Thanks,
Achenar
